analysis.description:
OysterPearl (/unique_chucks/22/0x45125b61f06b2e9b8fc8a2ea688c35e27086d2ae.sol#5-446) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0x45125b61f06b2e9b8fc8a2ea688c35e27086d2ae.sol#346-348)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/22/0x45125b61f06b2e9b8fc8a2ea688c35e27086d2ae.sol#224-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/22/0x45125b61f06b2e9b8fc8a2ea688c35e27086d2ae.sol#224-273) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch) (/unique_chucks/22/0x45125b61f06b2e9b8fc8a2ea688c35e27086d2ae.sol#239-242)
